content.rendered:
12 months. 365 days. 1 lockdown (so far). Maybe it wasn’t the year we were expecting but throughout 2021 we’ve been doing some pretty damn amazing work.

 

We designed and produced 1,053,765 pieces of printed collateral. Our talented dev team wrote 258,553 lines of code. Our account management team sent a whopping 34,743 emails. We scheduled 2184 social media posts. Wrote 132 monthly plans and much more. All in a year’s work for Harrison Carloss.

 

We do hope you’ve enjoyed a good 2021 too. Here’s a brief recap on what’s been going on for us over the year.

 

So where do we begin?

 

Let’s jump straight into the Harrison Carloss Customer Portal.

 

We launched our smart portal back in August to make it super easy for clients to access useful information about their account. The portal allows clients to manage their websites, warranties, check their marketing reports, Google Analytics, and get general support, all in one convenient, one-stop place. They can also access monthly website updates, Google Analytics data, marketing metrics – it’s all there at their fingertips. Neat, right?

 

Meet Tayler and Selina, our latest staff additions.

 

Tayler is a Creative Designer who reckons all the best designers are geeks – her included – admitting she couldn’t imagine doing anything but design. Well, maybe a professional pizza taster. Selina, one of our Account Execs, is another geek, in her case it’s for marketing and people, and she combines the two at Harrison Carloss. She describes herself as a problem solver, marketing idea generator, innovator and professional juggler.

 

Awards nominations? 9 at the last count.

 

We’ve actually been nominated for 9 awards in The Drum Recommends Digital Awards, The Drum Recommends Marketing & Advertising Awards, and the Prolific North Awards. We might also mention that, in addition, we’ve featured in The Northern Agency Guide 2021 for the second year running. There’s no escaping the fact that a lot of people love the way we work.

 

And then there’s our Google Partner status. 

 

We achieved the Google Partner accolade all thanks to the hard work and dedication of several members of the HC team who gained their qualifications for successfully managing and improving our clients’ Google Ad accounts. It means that we demonstrated Google Ads skill and expertise, met Google ad spend requirements, delivered company, agency and client revenue growth, and sustained and grown our client base.

 

Yes, a pretty busy year all round.

 

Now we’d just like to say a great big thank you to all of our lovely clients. We couldn’t have done it without you. Now we’re looking forward to an even busier 2022.

 

And while we’re on the subject of next year, there’s one more thing…

 

We’re going for Gold!

 

You’ll never guess what, so we’ll open up. 2022 marks the 50th anniversary of the day we at Harrison Carloss first opened our doors for business. Imagine! 50 golden years in business! Who said congratulations are in order? Naturally we have a few anniversary-marking things planned but we’re keeping those under wraps until the big reveal.

 

See you all for another exciting year in 2022!
